room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Mentor in Cleveland
review: So we did the Mansion Murder room. Didn't realize it was the second hardest, just booked it online. Had a blast. One of the locks wouldn't work and it was even fun getting it all straightened out. Staff had a great attitude and were just nice! Great place to spend some time.

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Mentor in Cleveland
review: We visited the Las Vegas site twice in the same day and it was great. We did the Murder Mansion and the Budapest Express.

room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Mentor in Cleveland
review: We had a great time at Escapology doing the Mansion Room with relatives on vacation. Challenging with lots of laughs, we had a great time. We will do again, next time we are together and want a fun time to remember.
